<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> Dealer Newsletter - March 2020
NEWS BRIEFS
BREAKING NEWS: To ensure the safety of our people during the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak, BendixKing has decided to withdraw from the AEA show in Nashville. This decision was made from an abundance of caution based upon prioritizing the health of everyone involved.
AEA is an important event for us, you and the industry. We remain dedicated to keeping you informed with alternative methods to share product announcements, details and training planned for the show.
Please contact your BendixKing Area Sales Manager <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]> with any questions.
OTHER NEWS: We’ve added a new international distributor to our network, which now includes rotorcraft: United Aero Group. For more on how to contact them or any other distributor, please visit our website here.
Announcing our 2020 Channel Partner Program <[[https://bkdealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Documents/]]> which includes updates to our experimental dealer network.
Also updated is our 2020 Co-Op Program <[[file://C:\\Users\H144988\Downloads\Co-Op-Program.pdf]]>, with exciting additions, such as new product demonstration equipment as well as lobby display packages to better support your sales and marketing needs. Any questions contact Lamonte Macon <[[mailto:lamonte.macon@honeywell.com?Subject=Would like more information about the 2020 Co-Op Program]]>. Check out more dealer-specific programs and documents here <[[https://bkdealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Documents/]]>.
KMA 30 Discontinued Please note the KMA 30 has been discontinued and replaced with the new slide-in replacement called the AeroPanel 100 <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropanel]]> / KMA 32. Please contact your BendixKing rep <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]> for more information.

PRODUCT FEATURE
INTRODUCING AEROPANEL 100 INTERCOM/AUDIO PANEL AeroPanel 100 is a convenient slide-in replacement for the BendixKing KMA 30. The music and Bluetooth capability provide unsurpassed audio flexibility throughout your airplane, and the 30-second digital recorder lets you play back any missed communications. AeroPanel 100 makes it simple to control audio throughout the aircraft including two music sources, 6-place intercom, and multiple audio inputs. Product Page>> <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeropanel]]>
TECH SUPPORT UPDATES
NETWORK ALERT: REPAIR VENDORS OLATHE UPDATE BendixKing has begun working more closely with its Repair Partners in the US to repair our parts that our customers send in to our Olathe facility. Repairs sent into the Olathe facility will likely see a tag issued by Duncan Aviation or Mid-Continent Instruments, with other partners to follow. Our Repair Partners have demonstrated a commitment to quality that presents a great value to both our customers and BendixKing. As always, you are welcome to reach out to these partners directly to have your BendixKing items repaired. Find Your Repair Partner >> <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/pages/repair-partners]]>
